Package io.github.ai4ci.flow.builders

Class DefaultModelBuilder

java.lang.Object
io.github.ai4ci.flow.builders.AbstractModelBuilder
io.github.ai4ci.flow.builders.DefaultModelBuilder
All Implemented Interfaces:
DefaultInHostMarkovStateInitialiser, DefaultInHostPhenomenologicalStateInitialiser, DefaultInHostStochasticStateInitialiser, DefaultNetworkSetup, DefaultOutbreakBaseliner, DefaultOutbreakInitialiser, DefaultPersonBaseliner, DefaultPersonInitialiser
public class DefaultModelBuilder extends AbstractModelBuilder implements DefaultNetworkSetup, DefaultOutbreakBaseliner, DefaultOutbreakInitialiser, DefaultPersonBaseliner, DefaultPersonInitialiser
Default, compositional model builder that assembles the standard set of setup, baselining and initialisation behaviours from small, focused interfaces. Extending model builders should consider whether to override behaviour by subclassing or by composing alternative interfaces. For example, to change the default outbreak baselining logic a builder could either implement a different baseliner interface or could subclass DefaultModelBuilder and override the baselineOutbreak method directly. Both approaches are valid and the best choice depends on the extent of the change and the desired level of modularity. The methods can coexist and the delegation to the default interfaces ensures that the wiring is clear and that alternative implementations can be easily swapped in without modifying the builder itself.

Rationale: the builder composes several default behaviour interfaces (for example DefaultNetworkSetup, DefaultOutbreakBaseliner and DefaultPersonInitialiser) rather than centrally implementing all logic. This compositional approach has several benefits:

  • Separation of responsibilities — each interface encapsulates a distinct concern such as network construction or person baselining.
  • Reusability — alternative builders can mix different interfaces to produce different default behaviours without duplicating code.
  • Testability — small interfaces are easier to mock and test in isolation.
  • Extensibility — callers can subclass DefaultModelBuilder and selectively override only the hooks they need to change.

Implementation detail: each public method in this class delegates to the corresponding default implementation on the composed interface using InterfaceName.super.method(...). This explicit delegation makes the wiring obvious and preserves the ability for subclasses to override behaviour either by implementing a different interface or by overriding the method directly.

Composition specifics: the class composes the following default interfaces in the standard build pipeline: DefaultNetworkSetup, DefaultOutbreakBaseliner, DefaultOutbreakInitialiser, DefaultPersonBaseliner and DefaultPersonInitialiser. The DefaultPersonInitialiser in particular centralises the orchestration that creates the in‑host model for each person (by delegating to the specialised in‑host initialiser interfaces) and sets importation and basic per‑person modifiers. To customise person initialisation replace the DefaultPersonInitialiser implementation or subclass DefaultModelBuilder and override the initialisePerson delegation method.

Downstream users such as examples and test harnesses can use this builder as a ready‑made configuration for most simulations and replace individual components by subclassing or by providing alternative interface implementations.

Author:
Rob Challen

  • Method Details

    • baselineOutbreak

      public io.github.ai4ci.abm.ImmutableOutbreakBaseline baselineOutbreak(io.github.ai4ci.abm.ImmutableOutbreakBaseline.Builder builder, Outbreak outbreak, Sampler sampler)
      Delegate outbreak base-lining to the default baseliner.

      The method forwards to the default implementation so that global outbreak baseline concerns (policy defaults, aggregated metrics) are defined in a single place. Subclasses can override to provide custom baselining behaviour or to compose alternative baseline logic.

      Specified by:
      baselineOutbreak in interface DefaultOutbreakBaseliner
      Specified by:
      baselineOutbreak in class AbstractModelBuilder
      Parameters:
      builder - the baseline builder to populate
      outbreak - the outbreak to base upon
      sampler - random sampler for any stochastic baseline choices
      Returns:
      the built outbreak baseline

    • baselinePerson

      public io.github.ai4ci.abm.ImmutablePersonBaseline baselinePerson(io.github.ai4ci.abm.ImmutablePersonBaseline.Builder builder, Person person, Sampler rng)
      Delegate person baselining to the default person baseliner.

      Person level baselining (demographics, household membership, persistent attributes) is provided by DefaultPersonBaseliner. This class keeps per person baseline logic modular and easily replaceable.

      Specified by:
      baselinePerson in interface DefaultPersonBaseliner
      Specified by:
      baselinePerson in class AbstractModelBuilder
      Parameters:
      builder - the person baseline builder to populate
      person - the target person instance
      rng - random sampler for any stochastic choices
      Returns:
      the built person baseline

    • initialiseOutbreak

      public io.github.ai4ci.abm.ImmutableOutbreakState initialiseOutbreak(io.github.ai4ci.abm.ImmutableOutbreakState.Builder builder, Outbreak outbreak, Sampler sampler)
      Delegate outbreak initialisation to the default outbreak initialiser.

      Outbreak runtime values that depend on the baselined outbreak are computed by DefaultOutbreakInitialiser. Delegating keeps this class focused on composition and makes it straightforward to swap in an alternative initialisation strategy.

      Specified by:
      initialiseOutbreak in interface DefaultOutbreakInitialiser
      Specified by:
      initialiseOutbreak in class AbstractModelBuilder
      Parameters:
      builder - the outbreak state builder to populate
      outbreak - the outbreak to initialise
      sampler - a random sampler used during construction
      Returns:
      the initial outbreak state

    • initialisePerson

      public io.github.ai4ci.abm.ImmutablePersonState initialisePerson(io.github.ai4ci.abm.ImmutablePersonState.Builder builder, Person person, Sampler rng)
      Delegate person initialisation to the default initialiser.

      The initialiser converts baseline values into runtime state. By delegating to DefaultPersonInitialiser the default conversion logic (for example seeding infection timers or initial immunity) is centralised and can be updated independently of the model builder.

      Specified by:
      initialisePerson in interface DefaultPersonInitialiser
      Specified by:
      initialisePerson in class AbstractModelBuilder
      Parameters:
      builder - the runtime person state builder to populate
      person - the person to initialise
      rng - random sampler for stochastic initial values
      Returns:
      the initial person state

    • setupOutbreak

      public io.github.ai4ci.abm.ModifiableOutbreak setupOutbreak(io.github.ai4ci.abm.ModifiableOutbreak outbreak, SetupConfiguration config, Sampler sampler)
      Delegate outbreak setup to the default network setup implementation.

      This method intentionally delegates to DefaultNetworkSetup.setupOutbreak(ModifiableOutbreak, SetupConfiguration, Sampler) so that network construction is maintained in a focused interface. To change network construction replace the composed interface or override this method in a subclass.

      Specified by:
      setupOutbreak in interface DefaultNetworkSetup
      Specified by:
      setupOutbreak in class AbstractModelBuilder
      Parameters:
      outbreak - the modifiable outbreak to configure
      config - the setup configuration driving creation choices
      sampler - a random sampler for stochastic choices
      Returns:
      the configured outbreak instance
